attributes.name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
Spell Scroll of Protection from Energy
Player Art Handout: The Road to Baldur's Gate
Thank you for purchasing Escape from Elturgard!

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LwoZFDwN1HClhPFMovp_description
attribs.current: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZFDxysXwLGhS0MPv_desc
attribs.current: Magical darkness doesnt impede the devils darkvision.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZFDxysXwLGhS0MPw_desc
attribs.current: The devil doesnt provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemys reach.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZFDxysXwLGhS0MPx_desc
attribs.current: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZFDxysXwLGhS0MPy_desc
attribs.current: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZIkPi0EpBMzKkeoN_desc
attribs.current: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LwoZaLtjpZgrRlxR4Mf_description
attribs.current: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZaLtjpZgrRlxR4Mi_desc
attribs.current: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZaLtjpZgrRlxR4Mj_desc
attribs.current: The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:    Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy  1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith  2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LwoZaZFwhM3xepBQl4L_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LwoZaZFwhM3xepBQl4L_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrv_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spells damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrv_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrw_spelldescription
attribs.current: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range: Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrx_spelldescription
attribs.current: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesnt understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it. Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the DM determines how the target behaves. If the target cant follow your command, the spell ends. Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you. Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn. Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means. Grovel. The target falls prone and then ends its turn. Halt. The target doesnt move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrx_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrx_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lry_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lry_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrz_spelldescription
attribs.current: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrz_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LwoZaZGls4kul--8lrz_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LwoZaZH3dflFG-PzH5j_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LwoZaZH3dflFG-PzH5j_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small, straight piece of iron

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LwoZaZH3dflFG-PzH5j_spelltarget
attribs.current: A humanoid that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LwoZaZH3dflFG-PzH5j_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target on additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LwoZaZH3dflFG-PzH5k_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spells effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LwoZaZH3dflFG-PzH5k_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LwoZi7cukMyrtXdrVHB_desc
attribs.current: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-lawful alignment

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-Lwoa4UTDDtNHJijTZOs_description
attribs.current: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Lwoa4UTDDtNHJijTZOv_desc
attribs.current: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LwoZFDwN1HClhPFMovp_description
attribs.current: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZFDxysXwLGhS0MPv_desc
attribs.current: Magical darkness doesnt impede the devils darkvision.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZFDxysXwLGhS0MPw_desc
attribs.current: The devil doesnt provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemys reach.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwoZFDxysXwLGhS0MPx_desc
attribs.current: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: Understands Celestial, Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwobIyH65fw9GLUIpz4_desc
attribs.current: Magical darkness doesn't impede the lemure's darkvision.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwobIyH65fw9GLUIpz5_desc
attribs.current: A lemure that dies in the Nine Hells comes back to life with all its hit points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LwobXxIv3WP3VdAEhVz_description
attribs.current: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwobXxJ3bcun1zAAIp5_desc
attribs.current: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwobfUi4AhUPF02FA2k_desc
attribs.current: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwobfUi4AhUPF02FA2l_desc
attribs.current: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LwuLdnhQuXSalHyOAa6_description
attribs.current: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LwuLdnhQuXSalHyOAa9_desc
attribs.current: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
